label: Is this the first time you've met?

choices.value: We go back to childhood.
Astonishingly, yes.
They're in my immediate family...
We've met a couple times.

label: Is this the first time you've thought about tossing a xanax in their mouth?

choices.value: I generally want to toss a xanax into the mouths of everyone to whom I speak.
Yes, but only because I've blocked out every other time I've had a conversation with them.
I'd never waste my hard earned xanax on this fool. There's a reason why it's been prescribed to me.
Why would anyone choose to drug someone?
I guess if you're into toxic relationships.
Absolutely Lovely!
Meh
Define Nice?

label: What is their body language saying to you?

choices.value: They could possibly spontaneously combust at any given moment.
Sloth like
Fluid, friendly and open
I can't see them right now, were on the phone.

label: Do you feel the urge to slap them in the face?

choices.value: Took every ounce to hold me back.
Those types of thoughts don't enter my mind.
They were so pleasant to be around, I cannot wait to see them again!
If I could digitally deliver it, I would.
